titleStmt.title: Morbus epidemicus: or The disease of the latter dayes: discovered and laid open in a sermon out of the II Ep. of Timothy, ch. 4, v. 3, 4. / By John Ramsey, minister of East Rudham in the county of Norfolk.
titleStmt.author: Ramsey, John, Minister of East Rudham.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Godbid, and are to be sold by Philip Briggs, at the Dolphin in St. Paul's Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Dolphin in St. Paul's Church-yard.
